cui_name: HEART DEFECTS, CONGENITAL, AND OTHER CONGENITAL ANOMALIES
reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major congenital anomalies: congenital heart defects (~800 per 100k births), neural tube defects (~150), limb defects (~200), cleft lip/palate (~100), other structural anomalies (~1500). Total ~2500-3500 per 100k births. This is a heterogeneous umbrella term mixing different organ systems with varying severity and prognosis. Low confidence due to category heterogeneity and overlap.
source: CDC Birth Defects Surveillance, WHO Global Burden of Disease estimates
